articles.title: Apple will give students free AirPods when they buy a MacBook Air or iPad Air
articles.text: Apple’s new back-to-school promotion for 2020 includes a set of free AirPods with the purchase of a MacBook Air or iPad Air. If you’re a student who’d rather have the AirPods Pro, you can upgrade for $90 instead of paying $250.
